plain_text:
Now that everyone has had a long weekend to reflect on the split between the cowboy and Dez Bryant, let's address a 
few themes.
Bryant was still clearly the Dallas Cowboys' Football team best receiver at the time of his departure.
Bryant is one of the best receivers in Cowboys history. He was genuinelely liked by his teammates
and regarded as a warrior.  That doesn't make him a leader. It if did, his fellow football players on the
team would have voted him to a captain position.
